attributes.title: SHOCK COLLAR OPERATION
attributes.description: YEOWCH!! The pain is almost unbearable yet we do this not only for charitable causes, but yearning for our love for such an audience as you all together. Building a surgeon patient and operating on it as in the game of OPERATION that you might all know,, and eating Our least of favorites foods make us want to throw up together but BFT once along a journey will no longer suffice…

attributes.title: Making Historical Gingerbread Monuments (GONE FRIENDLY?)
attributes.description: And if you don’t, that’s okay. Just make sure you’re getting a good night's sleep before school. And I know what you’re thinking: “Oh, sleep doesn’t matter. I have to watch my youtubes and tv shows as well as eat candy and chips.” Don’t listen to that part of your brain. Short term gratification won’t be remembered in 30 years. But you know what will? The degree you got because you took care of yourself. You slept well. You ate healthy. You got some exercise. You hung out with friends… So even if you aren’t watching BFS every Sunday, I want to know that you’re being a Best Friend to Yourself. And not just today… Always.

attributes.title: From Strangers to Friends | A BFS Story
attributes.description: Hey everyone. Hug your loved ones and merry Christmas. It doesn’t matter who you are, just make the most of the holiday and spread your cheer all over the world. Grab your love and spread the cheer everywhere! Yay! Just. Make the the world a better place and eat the candy and don’t fall from grace and make sure you hug your loved ones and merry Christmas and cheer! Whatever

attributes.title: Best of BFT 2023
attributes.description: Well there you have it guys, another year for the books filled with cheerful days and warm nights, together bonded like rope to a tree, love fills the air! Breathe in, and enjoy the ride!!!

attributes.title: We Tried Every Frozen Meal at H-E-B
attributes.description: We lied. We didnt try every meal. we were worried we’d get too full and that we would go over budget for this video (Our budget is $8 so we usde a lot of coupons) thank you to howard e butt for making your grocery store… but Ralph’s is better sorry :(
